title: Custom Game-map: 99-100% CDR SR
body:
There really needs to be a 99-100% CDR mode in custom games.

It is pretty impossible to practice warding or flashing walls with the current cooldowns

replies.body: For warding, you could just grab a Ruby Sightstone.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EHnEZOmz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-12T00:16:24.204+0000)
>
> For warding, you could just grab a Ruby Sightstone.

it is totally unnecessary to take 10 minutes for that
